trial.title: Surgical Stages of Liver Cirrhosis In Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma
trial.description: This study aims to establish clinical criteria for surgical stages of liver cirrhosis to guide treatment for hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).

overview.purpose: To evaluate the severity of liver cirrhosis and its impact on surgical treatment for patients with hepatocellular carcinoma.
overview.participant_commitment: Approximately 1 year with multiple clinic visits.

criteria.text: Age 18 â€“ 75 years (inclusive)
criteria.question: How old are you?

criteria.text: Clinically diagnosed with hepatocellular carcinoma confirmed by pathology
criteria.question: Have you been diagnosed with hepatocellular carcinoma?

criteria.text: Liver function grade Child-Pugh class A or B
criteria.question: What is your current liver function grade?

criteria.text: Ability to undergo open surgery
criteria.question: Are you able to undergo open surgery?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, I can undergo open surgery

criteria.text: No serious physical diseases that affect surgery
criteria.question: Do you have any serious health conditions that might affect your ability to have surgery?

criteria.text: Willingness to sign informed consent
criteria.question: Are you willing to sign a consent form for this study?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, I am willing to sign

criteria.text: No participation in other clinical trials within the last 30 days
criteria.question: Have you participated in any other clinical trials in the past month?

trial.title: Study Evaluating The Safety And Efficacy Of PF-05212377 Or Placebo In Subjects With Alzheimer's Disease With Existing Neuropsychiatric Symptoms On Donepezil
trial.description: This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of PF-05212377 in subjects with mild-to-moderate Alzheimer's Disease experiencing neuropsychiatric symptoms.

overview.purpose: To test if PF-05212377 improves cognitive and neuropsychiatric symptoms in individuals with Alzheimer's Disease already on Donepezil.
overview.participant_commitment: Approximately 18 weeks with multiple clinic visits.

criteria.text: Age 60 years or older
criteria.question: How old are you?

criteria.text: Clinical diagnosis of probable Alzheimer's Disease
criteria.question: Have you been diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease?

criteria.text: Existing neuropsychiatric symptoms with a score of 10 or greater on the NPI
criteria.question: Do you have neuropsychiatric symptoms that are significant?

criteria.text: Stable dose of Donepezil for at least four months
criteria.question: Have you been on a stable dose of Donepezil for at least four months?

criteria.text: No major structural brain disease other than Alzheimer's Disease
criteria.question: Do you have any other major brain diseases?

criteria.text: No participation in another clinical trial within the last 30 days
criteria.question: Have you participated in any other clinical trials in the past month?

criteria.text: Available for all study visits over the study duration
criteria.question: Can you commit to attending all study visits?

trial.title: Clinical Effect of No-touch Harvesting Technique in OPCABG
trial.description: This study investigates the clinical effect of the No-touch saphenous vein harvesting technique in off-pump coronary artery bypass grafting (OPCABG) compared to the conventional technique.

overview.purpose: To determine if the No-touch vein harvesting technique improves graft patency compared to conventional methods in patients undergoing OPCABG.
overview.participant_commitment: Approximately 6 months with follow-up visits at 3 months post-surgery.
key_procedures: Graft harvesting using No-touch or conventional technique
CTA to evaluate graft patency at 3 months

criteria.text: Age between 18 and 70 years
criteria.question: How old are you?

criteria.text: First-time isolated off-pump coronary artery bypass graft surgery
criteria.question: Is this your first time undergoing off-pump coronary artery bypass graft surgery?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, it is my first time

criteria.text: Ejection fraction greater than 35%
criteria.question: What is your most recent ejection fraction percentage?

criteria.text: Diameter of saphenous vein is at least 2mm
criteria.question: What is the diameter of your saphenous vein?

criteria.text: Willingness to sign informed consent
criteria.question: Are you willing to sign the informed consent form for this study?
criteria.expected_response: Yes, I am willing to sign

criteria.text: No urgent surgery required
criteria.question: Do you require any urgent surgery at this time?
criteria.expected_response: No, I do not require urgent surgery

criteria.text: No severe renal insufficiency
criteria.question: Do you have any issues with your kidneys, such as severe renal insufficiency?
criteria.expected_response: No, I do not have severe renal issues

criteria.text: No allergy to radiocontrast agents
criteria.question: Are you allergic to any radiocontrast agents?

criteria.text: No history of malignant tumors or severe systemic conditions
criteria.question: Do you have a history of any malignant tumors or severe systemic health issues?
criteria.expected_response: No, I do not have such a history

trial.title: Characteristics of Marrow Fatty Cells in the Ageing of Bone and Joints, Osteoarthritis and Osteoporosis
trial.description: This study aims to compare the characteristics of bone marrow adipocytes in post-menopausal women with knee osteoarthritis to those from subcutaneous adipose tissue.

overview.purpose: To understand if marrow fat contributes more to joint problems compared to subcutaneous fat in women with knee osteoarthritis.
overview.participant_commitment: Participants will undergo assessments before surgery and will be involved in the study until the primary completion date.
key_procedures: Blood tests for glucose, insulin, and lipids

criteria.text: Post-menopausal woman
criteria.question: Are you a post-menopausal woman?

criteria.text: Symptomatic knee osteoarthritis requiring prosthesis
criteria.question: Do you have knee osteoarthritis that is severe enough to require a prosthesis?

criteria.text: Able to handle general anaesthesia
criteria.question: Are you able to undergo general anaesthesia for surgery?

criteria.text: Able to understand the study constraints
criteria.question: Do you understand the requirements and constraints of this study?

criteria.text: Health insurance coverage
criteria.question: Do you have health insurance?

criteria.text: Able to understand French
criteria.question: Can you understand the French language?

criteria.text: No active infections or evolving cancer
criteria.question: Do you currently have any active infections or evolving cancer?

criteria.text: No previous surgery at the surgery site
criteria.question: Have you had any previous surgeries at the site where the prosthesis will be placed?

criteria.text: Not currently participating in another study
criteria.question: Are you currently participating in any other clinical trials?
criteria.expected_response: No, I am not in another study
